Class AccountHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccountHolder

  • public class AccountHolder
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AccountHolder(double balance)
      Constructor method It will prompt an error message in case the balance is negative

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actualBalance(double balance)
      This method will prompt the current balance of the account holder member
      void deposit(double deposit)
      This method will increase the balance of the account holder member with the amount of money that he or she deposits.
      void forceWithdrawal(double withdrawal) 
      void invalidRate()
      This method informs that the new monthly interest rate is invalid because it is out of range.
      void modifyMonthlyInterest(double rateUpdate)
      The modifyMonthlyInterest method update the rate used as monthly interest for an specific user.
      void monthlyInterest()
      This method update the account holder's balance by considering the monthly interest rate.
      void negativeBalance()
      This method will prompt a message to the account holder member when he/she wants to withdraw money and there is not enough in his/her account.
      void redNumbersWarning()
      This method will prompt a negative balance prompt message to the account holder member
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method formats the balance account value in order to have only two decimals.
      void withdrawal(double withdrawal)
      This method will decrease the balance of the account holder member with the amount of money that he or she withdraws in case the amount of money to withdraw leave the account balance above $100.

      • redNumbersWarning

        public void redNumbersWarning()
        This method will prompt a negative balance prompt message to the account holder member

      • actualBalance

        public void actualBalance(double balance)
        This method will prompt the current balance of the account holder member

      • negativeBalance

        public void negativeBalance()
        This method will prompt a message to the account holder member when he/she wants to withdraw money and there is not enough in his/her account.

      • deposit

        public void deposit(double deposit)
        This method will increase the balance of the account holder member with the amount of money that he or she deposits.
        Parameters:
        deposit - is the amount of money that the user would like to save in his/her account

      • forceWithdrawal

        public void forceWithdrawal(double withdrawal)

      • withdrawal

        public void withdrawal(double withdrawal)
        This method will decrease the balance of the account holder member with the amount of money that he or she withdraws in case the amount of money to withdraw leave the account balance above $100. Otherwise,
        Parameters:
        withdrawal - is the amount of money that the user would like to retire from his/her account

      • monthlyInterest

        public void monthlyInterest()
        This method update the account holder's balance by considering the monthly interest rate.

      • invalidRate

        public void invalidRate()
        This method informs that the new monthly interest rate is invalid because it is out of range. This rate should be between 0 and 1.

      • modifyMonthlyInterest

        public void modifyMonthlyInterest(double rateUpdate)
        The modifyMonthlyInterest method update the rate used as monthly interest for an specific user. Also, it will notify if the rate is incorrect in order to change it.
        Parameters:
        rateUpdate - is the new rate that should be applied to the account holder member.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method formats the balance account value in order to have only two decimals.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The account holder's balance formated
